name: Eresys
storyline:
An expelled cultist has been playing with the book that he stole from the order, on a cut-off island. His actions led to his death along with the inhabitants of the island and an unknown Void Portal left unchecked. On the other hand, you and your fellow cultists need to send the entity back from where it came from and seal the portal. Claim the sources that are needed to complete the offer of the altars.
Smart Mechanics - Only by working as a team will you come out of this forest alive.
summary: Eresys is a co-op game with horror elements inspired by H.P Lovecraft which focuses mainly on teamwork. A party of 4 players face together the fears of the Lovecraftian Universe. Featuring smart AI mechanics with horrifying entities that will make you regret stepping into the forest.
